concept.title: Automatic Speech Recognition Custom Commands Overview

conbody.p: This document provides an overview of ASR Custom Commands.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: This library provides custom commands for the ASR Client Utility.
The DLL that provides the functionality and the library to which your code must link is identified below.

entry.p: These files are used for implementing ASR Custom Commands.

section.title: Architectural Relationship
section.p: ASR Custom Commands is an extension of the MMF Controller framework that supports speech recognition.

section.title: Description
section.p: The ASR Custom Commands extend the basic functionality of the ASR Client Utility. The CSpeechRecognitionCustomCommands class communicates with the controller plugin via the RMMFController::CustomCommandSync() function.
ASR Custom Commands follows the standard custom commands pattern for MMF.

section.title: Key ASR Custom Commands Classes
section.p: The speech recognition functionality provided by the ASR Custom Commands is contained within the following key classes:

section.title: Using ASR Custom Commands
section.p: Clients can use the ASR Custom Commands to:

li.p: Add a new entry into the lexicon.
Add a new rule into the grammar.
Save current changes into permanent storage.
